gameDetails.name: Core Worlds: Galactic Orders Promo Pack
gameDetails.description: The Core Worlds: Galactic Orders Promo Pack consists of 7 cards, including Buono (a new Core World) and reprints of the original 6 Core Worlds with added flavor text. The Promo Pack was available at Spiel 2012 and BGG.CON 2012, as well as with the pre-order for Core Worlds: Galactic Orders.
